website_summaries.verdict: A quality, quick-warming heater that comes with a fantastic assortment of stones in several sizes.
pros: Moderately-sized to keep in a salon or home
Includes 36 hand-chosen basalt stones in varying sizes
Stones retain heat from 15 to 40 minutes, depending upon how hot you like

customer_reviews.title: No heat retention
customer_reviews.text: It came very dusty and moldy looking with all these spots everywhere ! The heating element doesn’t get hot enough ! Nor does the rocks stay hot for more than 1/3 minute
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: my husband and i love this kit. it is a great value and wonderful to have.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Walters

customer_reviews.title: Wrong voltage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t use it at all. Clearly meant for sale to another country — 120/230 V appliance. Can’t even use an adaptor safely.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Hall

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just started to add stones to my massage business this is so great everything came into one bundle this has helped and increased my profit using hot stones
customer_reviews.author: Dell Lowry-Schiller

customer_reviews.title: First time running it will burn off the film that is on there
customer_reviews.text: We love it we have a professional massage therapist use them on us
customer_reviews.author: nronco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It is a little heavy not portable at all but overall a great set!
customer_reviews.author: Erin G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks presentable
customer_reviews.text: No frills and easy to use. The selection of different sizes of stones is generous and the large spoon makes it easy to fish them up and immerse them without splashing hot water
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Good value
customer_reviews.text: 'I am so pleased I added hot stone massage as a service in my business. I can charge a much better rate than the other beauty treatments. The e-book was a thorough starting point but I have taken a course as well to be sure.'
customer_reviews.author: Valuable Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRULY A PROFESSIONAL SET
customer_reviews.text: This set is FANTASTIC! The stone warmer heats quickly and performs admirably throughout the day. There are enough stones for all of my needs, and most importantly - they are extremely smooth and do not irritate the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Great stone heater
customer_reviews.text: Heats very fast just wish it had a temp setting. I like 120 degrees and can’t set to that temp
customer_reviews.author: Larry Avery

product_meta.title: Massage Stone Water Heater 36 Stones E-Book inc.
feature_bullets: PRODUCT – Massage Stone Water Heater 20 x 14 x 10in. Provided with 36 Basalt Hot Stones 8 Large Oval (3 x 2 x 0.6in) 12 Medium Oval (2.6 x 1.8 x 0.7in) 16 Small Oval (1.5 x 1.2 x 0.7in). 1 Black Velvet Drawstring Bag (15 x 10in)
WEIGHT - Total weight 15lb. Perfect for Salon use and in the home. For more portable heaters, please see other products on Amazon by Amethyst Lake – Massage Stone Heaters are our Speciality.
BASALT STONES – These stones are large enough to retain the heat for a long and relaxing massage. Heat from 15 to 40 minutes depending on intensity required.
TEXTURE – The correct smoothness for a relaxing massage. Not too rough and not so smooth that the stones are slippery.
STYLISH – The chrome heater will be the perfect addition to your beauty and relaxation equipment.
